results.title: Data Manipulation in Python: Master Python, Numpy & Pandas
results.author: Meta Brains
results.headline: Learn Python, NumPy & Pandas for Data Science: Master essential data manipulation for data science in python
results.description:
When it comes to being attractive, data scientists are already there. In a highly competitive job market, it is tough to keep them after they have been hired. People with a unique mix of scientific training, computer expertise, and analytical abilities are hard to find.

Like the Wall Street "quants" of the 1980s and 1990s, modern-day data scientists are expected to have a similar skill set. People with a background in physics and mathematics flocked to investment banks and hedge funds in those days because they could come up with novel algorithms and data methods.


That being said, data science is becoming one of the most well-suited occupations for success in the twenty-first century. It is computerized, programming-driven, and analytical in nature. Consequently, it comes as no surprise that the need for data scientists has been increasing in the employment market over the last several years.

The supply, on the other hand, has been quite restricted. It is challenging to get the knowledge and abilities required to be recruited as a data scientist.

Lots of resources for learning Python are available online. Because of this, students frequently get overwhelmed by Python's high learning curve.


It's a whole new ball game in here! Step-by-step instruction is the hallmark of this course. Throughout each subsequent lesson, we continue to build on what we've previously learned. Our goal is to equip you with all the tools and skills you need to master Python, Numpy & Pandas.

You'll walk away from each video with a fresh idea that you can put to use right away!

All skill levels are welcome in this course, and even if you have no prior programming or statistical experience, you will be able to succeed!

results.title: Not-for-Profit Accounting-Charities, Colleges, & Health Care
results.author: Robert (Bob) Steele
results.headline: Learn Not-for-Profit accounting from a practicing CPA
results.description:
Not for Profit Accounting-Charities, Colleges, & Health Care will cover accounting principles related to not for profit organizations.

Our concentration will be on nongovernmental not-for-profit organizations. However, we will discuss the differences between nongovernmental not for profit organization and governmental not-for-profit organizations. We will also discuss accounting concepts for both governmental and nongovernmental organizations related to health care and colleges.

The course will start by introducing what a not for profit organization is. We will discuss regulation, taxation, and performance issues related to the not for profit organization. As we discuss accounting for not for profit organization, we will make comparisons to for profit organizations, concentrating most of our time on the areas where accounting concepts differ between the two.

Next, we will get into the details of accounting for not for profit organizations, discussing generally accepted accounting principles and the recording of transactions.

We will then take a look at example problems, recoding transactions related to a not for profit organization. We will work through example problems in a presentation format. We will then provide Excel worksheets and step by step instructional videos for learners to apply what they have learned. The Excel worksheets will include two tabs, one with the completed answer, and a second with preformatted worksheets. Learners can enter data into the preformatted worksheets in a step by step process following instructional videos.

Next, we will discuss colleges and universities in detail. We compare and contrast governmental not-for-profit colleges and universities as well as nongovernmental not-for-profit colleges. We will also discuss for-profit colleges.

The course will present example problems in a presentation format and will then provide Excel worksheet and instructional videos so that learners can apply what they have learned.

Next, we will discuss health care organizations in detail. We will consider both governmental health care organizations and nongovernmental health care organizations. The course will present example problems and will then provide practice Excel worksheet and step by step instructional videos so learners can apply what they have learned.

results.title: Pursue Top 1% Career: Become The No. 1 Success Magnet
results.author: Susmita Dutta
results.headline: Hidden Success Formula to conquer the corporate world
results.description:
**Course Updated - April 2022**

>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED: NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 180,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


Are you not able to convert job interviews into job offers? Or your appraisals into promotions?

Do you have all of the required qualifications, yet are not able to create an unforgettable impression?

Are you looking for a key that will unlock success in your life?


What if I tell you that except YOU, nothing else matters when it comes to YOUR success.

Did you know, people remember you the way you make them feel instead of the words that you actually said. So, if you want to create an unforgettable first impression, it is very important that you prepare yourself with the correct tools and techniques before you even go to meet the person in question whom you want to impress or go to the event/interview.


I have asked this one question to the many decision-makers all over the world "If you would like to see the change that will make your organization more productive, what would it be?"


And everybody came back with one word and they said ATTITUDE. If people had a better disposition, they would have better team coordination, quality would go up, the bottom line would go up, and obviously, success is bound to follow.


Did you know that 85% of the time a person gets a job or a promotion is because of the disposition? ONLY 15% depends on how intelligent they are or how many facts and figures they know.


And almost 100% of the education dollars go to teaching facts and figures which accounts for only 15% of the success, and what we are talking about in this course is 85%. This is what brings us to a point that it is not our position but our disposition that determines our success.

Now, once you are standing in front of the person you want to impress, you want to make sure that you connect with them on a personal as well as a professional level. Ahh!! It is not as simple as it sounds. It is such a gift to give somebody your undivided attention and really share with them and exchange.


And the way we connect with somebody is through the set of tools and techniques that you will learn in this course. Well! Doesn't it feel very awful to receive a limp handshake from somebody? It's the extension of your energy, and when you cut that energy off and kind of dangle it meekly with the person in front of you creates a disconnect.


So, make sure you master all these techniques and attract the feelings of openness and positive vibes all around you… So that anyone in this world genuinely wants to connect with you and be friends with you for the rest of their lives.


This course will empower you with the entire blueprint, which can transform you into a success magnet. This course will help you create a long-lasting impression and they will remember the WAY you made them feel. That's how you become UNFORGETTABLE and a SUCCESS Magnet

results.title: Storytelling With Imagery For Persuasion & Personal Brand
results.author: Alex Genadinik
results.headline: Storytelling for persuasion! Use storytelling to make impactful points and arguments. Personal & corporate storytelling.
results.description:
Learn storytelling in two ways:

1) The traditional story arch and all the important story elements

2) Create creative imagery with your writing and vocal presentation that inspires emotions in your audience, becomes memorable, and leaves a lasting and impactful lesson and impression.

USE EMOTIONS FOR PERSUASION

People make decisions emotionally much more than logically. That's why great storytelling is about painting a picture in someone's mind and making them see things your way. In this course, you'll learn how to create imagery with your writing and make people see your vision in addition to responding to facts and figures.

USE STORYTELLING IN THESE SETTINGS

  • Impress at a job interview

  • With corporate team-building

  • Help people know you better in personal relationships

  • Create better business presentations

  • Storytelling using video

  • Make more convincing arguments that have true emotional appeal

  • Tell your personal brand story

  • Tell your corporate brand story better

  • Use storytelling and imagery in creative writing like songs or poems

FILLED WITH STORYTELLING EXERCISES AND OPPORTUNITIES TO PRACTICE

Many of the videos give you a chance to create your own stories and compare them with how I'd write them. This makes the course more interactive and helps you test your own storytelling.

DIFFERENT MEDIUM

Learn how to adjust your stories for different medium ranging from YouTube videos to in-person job interviews to writing.

Invest in your future. Enroll today.

results.description:
سيتناول الكورس أهم النماذج المستخدمة في حياتنا اليومية و العملية من برنامج مايكروسوفت اكسل

قوالب Excel المجانية لمساعدتك على إنشاء جداول البيانات بسهولة

يعد Microsoft Excel أحد أكثر البرامج تنوعاً ومفيداً في مجموعة Office. لا يهم إذا كنت بحاجة إلى قوالب Excel لوضع ميزانية للسنة المالية المقبلة، أو تعقب مخزون أعمالك، أو تخطيط الوجبات، أو إنشاء ورقة مسودة كرة القدم الخيالية، فهناك الكثير من قوالب Microsoft Excel. على سبيل المثال، إذا كنت بحاجة إلى تصور البيانات عبر جدول زمني، ففكر في قوالب مخطط Excel Gantt، الجاهزة والمتاحة للتخصيص مع معلومات المشروع المحددة.

إن إمكانات Excel لا تتوقف عند هذا الحد. إذا كنت تبحث عن قوالب Excel لاستخدامها في المنزل، ففكر في جدول أعمال أسبوعي أو قائمة مهام منزلية. تقوم قوالب Excel المجانية هذه بإبعاد الضغط عن الحاجة إلى تذكر الشخص الذي سيتولى تنظيف الحمامات أو غسل الأطباق. وبالمثل، يمكن أن تساعدك قوالب جداول بيانات Excel أيضاً في إعداد ميزانية قصيرة وطويلة الأجل. تأتي جداول البيانات هذه مع مجموعة واسعة من الصيغ المضمّنة التي يتم إكمالها تلقائياً بعد تعبئة الصفوف القليلة الأولى. أي قائمة أو مخطط تتصورهم، هناك قالب Excel مخصص لهم.

results.title: Canadian Citizenship Test Your Immigration Dream
results.author: SMARTER ACADEMY
results.headline: Canadian-Citizenship Practice Test  CANADA nationality Canada’s Economy Justice System and History
results.description:
Canadian Citizenship Test Your Immigration Dream

97% Pass in First Attempt Easily

Canadian-Citizenship Practice Test  Canadian Symbols Modern Canada Canada’s Economy Justice System and History

The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test, administered by the Department of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada, that is required for all applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged between 14 and 64 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship.

The exam is commonly written, however in a few cases it might be oral and take vicinity inside the form of an interview with a citizenship officer. The branch of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship decides if the applicant’s check is written or oral, relying on their diverse standards.

Failure to pass the Canadian Citizenship Test will result that you will either have to go through another test or an interview with the Judge.


Use our following Practice Test for Canadian Citizenship to bypass and get your Canada passport today.

The citizenship exam lasts for 30 minutes and carries 20 multiple desire questions. applicants for citizenship must answer at the least 15 (75%) questions effectively to skip the test.

You should bypass the Canadian Citizenship check to get your citizenship, therefore, it’s miles very essential that you have enough exercise earlier than the actual check. To help you in making ready on your Canadian Citizenship check, we come up with this unique online Canadian Citizenship take a look at education machine, which incorporates questions related to your province or territory.

Moreover, our check includes questions which regarded inside the actual test so it better allows in your guidance. Our system randomly generates questions from our large understanding and query database and offers your ratings based totally in your answers.

The test contains questions drawn from a pool of round two hundred, and is primarily based at the content material of the reputable manual “find out Canada (The Rights and obligations of Citizenship)”. The take a look at asks questions about the following challenge subjects


    • Rights and duties of a Canadian citizen – (e.g. “name 3 criminal rights covered by way of the Canadian constitution of Rights and Freedoms.”)

    • Canadian records – (e.g. “Who have been the United Empire Loyalists?”)

    • Canadian political systems – (e.g. “How are members of Parliament selected?”)

    • Canadian bodily and political geography – (e.g. “in which are the Parliament homes positioned?”)

    • Specific questions about the applicant’s vicinity – (e.g. “what is the call of the top-rated of your province or territory?”)

Canadian values, such as democracy, gender equality, and human rights, are tons greater emphasized in this new version. Canada’s native roots and populace also are lots better portrayed. more information can be found here.

The take a look at additionally assesses language abilities. To pass the check, the applicant ought to apprehend easy statements and questions and communicate easy records to CIC workforce in either French or English.

On March 15, 2010, a brand new and greater thorough take a look at became introduced. This take a look at is primarily based on an extended sixty three-web page guide referred to as discover Canada. This offers immigrants a richer image on Canada’s history, culture, law and politics. at the same time, immigrants are required to memorize extra facts for the test.

You need to answer 15 Questions correctly out of 20 questions in order to pass your Canadian Citizenship Test.

  • Brief discussion about the Canadian Citizenship Application Process

  • Statistics on how many people have applied for a Canadian Citizenship

Introduction to a Canadian Citizenship Practice Test

  • Why a Canadian Citizenship Test is required for your citizenship application?

  • About the test

  • Who are eligible to take the test?

  • Possible results after getting the test? What will happen after I pass/fail the test?

  • Studies/Statistics to people who passed and failed the test?

Conclusion to Canadian Citizenship Test

Recommendation to Canadian Citizenship Test


It all begins from a simple test – A Brief Discussion to a Canadian Citizenship Test

To be a Canadian is to feel compassionate to other people regardless of their race, gender and religion. In fact, one for every five people in Canada was born in a foreign land who arrived in the country as an immigrant. They presented roughly 20% of the country’s total population, making Canada more diverse than China. Having a life in Canada is one of the most wonderful experience a person can ever get. A nation with respect to human rights, equality and freedom among its citizen.

One must truly say that being Canadian means both privilege and opportunity. In fact, a permanent Canadian citizen can gain access to a lot of opportunities and benefits such as free healthcare and access to a publicly well-funded school. This is what it means to become a Canadian citizen. Moreover, after passing all the necessary steps;

You will be able to work in all jobs, you can work across vertical industries, from business to entertainment.

Your children will automatically be Canadian.

You can get involved in politics and a right to vote.

You no longer need to renew your PR Card.

You cannot be deported and will receive a support from the Canadian Consular Office.

You will be given the right to apply for a Canadian passport and travel across 185 countries.

Most importantly, you can continue getting social benefits.

More people have been applying for a Canadian citizenship and hoping to receive the benefits mandated by the state. One of the steps to become an official citizen is by taking up a Canadian Citizenship Test, it is administered by the Department of Immigration of which all immigrants and refugees who are applying for a citizenship is required to take. It grants citizenship for all those who will pass the exam and was meant to facilitate immigrants and refugees to settle permanently in Canada.

The Cost of a Wonderful Living

Now what are the requirements that you need to submit and present to obtain a Canadian citizenship?

  • People aged over 18yrs. Old are eligible to take the exam

  • Must be able to speak and write any of Canada’s official languages (English and French)

  • Have been settling in Canada for 3 years out of the last 5 years before the day of application.

  • Have filed all taxes for at least 3 years during the last 5 years, note that all income taxes that you owe must be fully paid.

Canadian Citizenship can only be obtained through a legal permanent residency in Canada or through the following.

If the person is under 18 years of age, the guardian or the parent of the applicant will have to apply on behalf of them for a citizenship.

If the person is over 18 years of age and have children, he/she can include application with your own.

Fast track citizenship application process is given to any member of the Canadian Armed Forces.

Upon the day of the test, the applicant must present a letter of consent from the government informing the authorities on the actual day of your test, followed by an informal interview that can take up to 30 minutes and you will be asked to provide all the necessary documents for the citizenship test.

Each applicant must bring the following,

  • Record of Landing (IMM 1000) or Confirmation of Permanent Residence (IMM 5292)

  • Permanent Resident Card (PRC).

  • One identity document which includes the applicant’s photograph with signature.

  • Passports and all travel documents that the applicant possess.

  • Original copies of all supporting documents such as Birth Certificate, Marriage Contract etc.

After submitting the requirements, it will now be verified through the following information,

  • Signature of the applicant on the notice form is necessary.

  • The signature provided in the notice form will be verified by comparing it to the signatures in the applicant’s supporting documents.

  • Photos provided along with the supporting documents will be verified against the person in front of the official. This is the reason why your actual presence is really important.

Take note, that applicants who fail to prove their identity will not be allowed to take the actual test. Citizenship officers will then check the original copies and will coordinate the authenticity of these documents to the corresponding consular offices.

Only those who completed the requirements will continue to take the exam, only certified copies or original copies of documents can be accepted as proof of application unless the applicant is currently applying for a replacement of certificate.

Now that the requirements are ready, time to schedule and pass the Canadian Citizenship Exam.

The Test of Fate

The test is based on a study guide by the government to determine the applicant’s knowledge in Canadian history, geography, culture and politics.

The citizenship exam lasts for 30 minutes with 20 multiple questions, applicants who are taking up the exam must answer at least 15 correct questions out of 20 to pass the exam.

Passing rate for the last 5 years is more than 60%, but rest assured that this test is not as easy as your history lessons. The exam is totally different, imagine for instance, an immigrant who have been a Filipino citizen for his entire life might face the most difficult written exam in his entire life. For the test focuses on a wide range of subject matters such as:

  • Rights and Responsibilities of a Canadian Citizen

  • Canadian History

  • Canadian Political Systems

  • Canadian Physical and Political Geography

Canadian roots and population will also be portrayed in the exam and the applicant must have an idea on how they value democracy, gender equality and human rights.

The exam is usually written, however in some cases, this test might be done in oral depending on the situation. The test is divided into different stages, from the history of the native people who first lived in Canada, the language that they use, their culture and the early form of their civilization. The first segment of the exam focuses more on the history of the first people in Canada and the language that they use although out the colonial period.

Taking up the exam means to study the entire history, demographics and geography of Canada. After finishing the first segment of the exam, it will be followed by a test on Modern Day Canada, Economy and Symbolism. This test shows you the actual scenario of what it means to become a real Canadian Citizen and embracing the history and rich culture of Canada.

By failing to prepare, you prepare to fail.

There different institutions and online practices that you can find to sharpen your deep knowledge about the Canadian history, culture, roots and politics. Prepare yourself and begin to ready your history books and take up online courses for the exam only allows you have 5 wrong answer, answer all the questions and if you do not know the answer, a 25% chance of guessing the right answer might help you out. Read much and study harder before the exam but make sure not to put too much pressure on it. Get some rest and a decent sleep before the day of examination. Relax, read and understand the questions.

After Passing the Exam

If the applicant met the requirements of having a minimum of 15 correct answers and when the official has done verifying the authenticity of the applicant’s documents. He/she will be invited to attend a citizenship ceremony within 4-6 months or might receive another questionnaire requesting more evidence of living in Canada.

After passing the exam, the citizenship authorities will provide the exact date and time of the citizenship ceremony, in the ceremony, the applicant will begin to take an Oath of Citizenship announcing that he is now legally and officially a Canadian citizen. After the Oathtaking, the applicant’s citizenship certificate will be given.

Try not to worry more about the residency questionnaire, for it will only ask the applicant to provide more evidence of his living in Canada. Usually this is given to those who have traveled a lot outside Canada or those who have complexity in the application. Once the applicant receives this residency questionnaire, he will be invited for an interview once again with the citizenship officer and might ask for more supportive documents.

A hope for those who failed the Citizenship Test

If the applicant failed to pass exam but meet all the requirements to become a Canadian citizen, the Citizenship Officer will recommend the applicant to retake the exam or reschedule a second test. This could happen within 4-8 weeks after the commencement of the first one. The applicant must confirm his attendance for the second exam to the authorities immediately. During the second exam, the applicant will also receive the results on the same day. If the applicant, once again failed the exam he will be invited by a citizenship judge for an interview that usually takes 30-90 minutes. You will be asked a lot of questions orally on why you need to become a Canadian citizen. The judge would want to know the motives of your application and might ask the legitimacy of the time that you spent living in Canada. This interview will also test your English or French language skills as well as your knowledge about Canada.

What is JavaScript?

JavaScript, often abbreviated JS, is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS. Over 97% of websites use JavaScript on the client-side for web page behavior, often incorporating third-party libraries.


Why JavaScript?


  • Client-side JavaScript is very fast because it can be run immediately within the client-side browser.

  • You can use JavaScript to include such items as drag-and-drop components and sliders to give a Rich Interface to your site visitors.

  • JavaScript is relatively simple to learn and implement.

  • Popularity.

  • Interoperability.

  • Server Load.

  • Gives the ability to create rich interfaces.

What does this course offer you?


  • This course consists of 1 practice test.

  • The practice test consists of 40 questions, timed at 60 minutes

  • The questions are multiple-choice.

  • Every question is associated with a knowledge area

  • The answers are randomized every time you take a test

  • Once the test was taken, you will get an instant result report with categories of strength to weakness.

  • You can re-take the tests over and over again as and when it suits you.

Who this course is for:


  • Programmers wishing to get certified in JS

  • Beginner and Intermediate level JS Developers

  • Young Adults and Kids

  • JS developers who want to test their JS knowledge.

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 180,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


The world finally understands the essential role of design. Products look better than ever, interfaces feel intuitive, and companies are hiring designers at an increasing rate. But, the designer’s role has been changing over the last few years. It’s no longer enough to iterate and understand your user, instead of in today’s world, designers should be able to do both – identify problems and build solutions, which will increase their worth by at least 10 times for any company. When you can do both, you can do things that no one else can do and you will be a unique asset to your company.

There’s a shift underway in large organizations, one that puts design much closer to the center of the enterprise. But the shift isn’t about aesthetics. It’s about applying the principles of design for a better user experience. This new approach is in large part a response to the increasing complexity of modern technology and modern business.  

Most people don't think about how poorly designed everyday interactions are until they learn the principles of good design and user experience, many of which are not intuitive. You don't need to be born thinking about this stuff in order to become a successful designer, it's a skill that can be developed like anything else. Passion often follows knowledge and expertise.   

In this course, I have explained the entire design process which when integrated into your product can create an amazing user experience. You will also learn to approach a problem in a systematic manner. Working in a series is the most important stage of the design process. The ability to experiment, value and learn from mistakes, and build on the experience achieved is the hallmark of the truly successful and creative individual, whatever the field.     So, what are you waiting for?? Get Enrolled and start your journey today… Happy learning my dear friends. See you in the course

results.description:
Registered Medical Assistant RMA Practice Tests

97% Pass in First Attempt Easily


Preparing for your RMA (Registered Medical Assistant) exam by taking practice tests has many benefits. Using sample questions to study for your test is the most effective study practice you can use. The advantages of using RMA sample tests include:

  • Increasing Your Speed – The RMA exam has a three hour time limit. Although most students who take the RMA feel that there is sufficient time, taking the practice tests with self-imposed timers help you budget your time effectively. You should budget approximately 1 minute for each question.

  • Becoming comfortable with the Test Format – Every standardized test has its own unique format. As you take practice RMA tests you will become comfortable with the format of the actual test. Once the test day arrives you will have no surprises!

  • Concentrating Your Prep Time – As you take more and more sample quizzes you begin to get a feel for the topics that you know well and the areas that you are weak on. Many students waste a lot of valuable study time by reviewing material that they are good at (often because it is easier or makes them feel better). The most effective way to study is to concentrate on the areas that you need help on.

RMA EXAM OVERVIEW

The RMA certification exam consists of 200-210 questions that count towards your score. All of the questions will be multiple choice questions with four answer options.

Candidates are given a total of three hours to complete the test. The test topics are based on a national job analysis study that determined the key job components of a medical assistant.

results.title: QuickBooks Payroll - QuickBooks Online
results.author: Robert (Bob) Steele
results.headline: Processing QuickBooks Online payroll for a small business, generating paychecks, processing payroll tax forms
results.description:
QuickBooks Online payroll will describe the payroll process for a small business in detail, so bookkeepers, accountants, and business owners can better understand how to set up payroll, process payroll, and troubleshoot problems related to payroll.

This course will introduce the payroll set-up in the QuickBooks Online system, walking through payroll screens.

We will discuss payroll legislation that will affect payroll calculations within QuickBooks Online and list the payroll forms we will need to generate from Quickbooks Online.

The course will walk through the process of entering a new employee into the QuickBooks Online system and describe where the data would be received from in practice including Form W-4.

We will discuss Federal Income Tax (FIT) calculations within QuickBooks Online. The course will describe how FIT is calculated, what is needed for QuickBooks Online to calculate FIT, and how to enter the data into the accounting system.

The course will describe the Federal Income Contributions Act (FICA) and its components.

We will calculate social security and describe how QuickBooks Online will help with the calculations as we process payroll.

The course will calculate Medicare and describe how QuickBooks Online will help with the calculations of Medicare when we process payroll.

We will calculate Federal Unemployment (FUTA) and discuss how FUTA is related to state unemployment (SUTA).

The course will describe and calculate employer taxes and discuss which taxes are employee taxes and which taxes are employer taxes.

We will describe payroll journal entries and discuss how payroll data is populated in the QuickBooks Online reports and financial statements including the profit and loss and balance sheet.

We will discuss and enter both mandatory and voluntary deductions into the QuickBooks Online system.

The course will discuss retirement plan options, how to enter them into the QuickBooks Online system, and how they are used to calculate net income and payroll taxes.

We will work a comprehensive problem, processing payroll within QuickBooks Online. The comprehensive problem will use the paid QuickBooks Online feature.

The comprehensive problem will start very basic with one employee and will increase in complexity as we enter more benefits and payroll details each year.

results.title: 2022 Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Practice Tests BASICS
results.author: SMARTER ACADEMY
results.headline: Most Common questions for Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Practice Tests with detailed answers
results.description:
Welcome to Most Common questions for Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in 2021


This CNA practice test contains 40 of the most essential Certified Nursing Assistant questions that will help you prepare for your exam. The test has just been updated for February 2021. This is the first test in a series that covers the knowledge and skills of basic nursing you’ll need as a new certified nursing assistant (CNA). The questions are based on the same categories that are included in the official exam. The test covers the following topics: patient safety and emergency situations, positioning the patient, use of restraints, learning the metric system, and preventing your own injuries. Each multiple-choice question has four answer options. Read the question and select the best answer. Not sure which one is right? Click on the hint. If you still make a mistake, you’ll see the correct response displayed along with an explanation to help you understand. If you miss more than eight questions, you can restart the test and try again.

What to expect on the CNA exam

Your CNA exam will have two parts: the written exam (you’ll have 90 minutes to complete 60 multiple choice questions) and the clinical skills test. The written part will test your knowledge of nursing concepts, while the clinical skills test requires you to perform several essential nursing tasks in front of an evaluator. The skills test portion is about 35-45 minutes and covers five or more skills.

Alternate names:

A CNA test is also known as:

  • Certified Nursing Assistant examination

  • Nursing assistant test

  • CNA knowledge test

  • CNA exam

  • Nurse assistant test

Why CNAs are important

Certified Nursing Assistants are vital members of the health care team. Your skills can keep your patients safe and comfortable. Your ability to provide hands-on care means that you may be the first to notice changes in your patients. You have a lot to learn, but we are here to help. Start with the basic skills. Nearly everything builds from there. As you learn, you will become a valuable team member. Remember that health care would not be possible without the CNA.


CNA – A Certified Nursing Assistant is a nurse that helps patients with healthcare needs under the supervision of a Registered Nurse (RN) or a Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN). Also known as a Nursing Assistant (NA) a Patient Care Assistant (PCA) or a State Tested Nurse Aid (STNA), the individual who carries this title needs a strong work ethic and ability, but issues of liability and legality prevent CNA’s from performing certain procedures.

We have the Best Free CNA Practice Test Online.
These are full-length practice exams with challenging questions. Questions are scored instantly and detailed explanations are provided for each answer.

results.title: Money In Excel - Income Tax Sch. C & Personal Financials
results.author: Robert (Bob) Steele
results.headline: Learn how Money in Excel can be used to create financial reports and complement traditional accounting software like QBO
results.description:
Money in Excel is an Excel template provided by Microsoft that has bank connectivity similar to many accounting software applications such a QuickBooks, bank connectivity allowing for the download of financial data directly from the financial institutions.

Money in Excel can be used to construct a small business income statement which could be useful when preparing an income tax return Schedule C Profit or Loss From Business.

The Money in Excel template can also be used to complement accounting software such as QuickBooks. For example, many small businesses use accounting software like QuickBooks to record financial transactions and construct financial statements for their business. However, far fewer use financial accounting software to fulfill the same functions for their individual finances, a task that may be accomplished with Money in Excel.

Unlike financial accounting software, Money in Excel will also bring in balance sheet data directly from our financial institutions and put it in one location, balance sheet data like checking accounting balances, savings accounting balances, brokerage account balances, credit card balances, loan balances, and mortgage balances.

Accounting software like QuickBooks does not generally pull balance sheet balances directly from financial institutions because accounting software is designed to construct the ending balances using the double entry accounting system. Once the balance sheet balances have been constructed traditional accounting software will compare our book balance to the institution balance using tools such as bank reconciliations.

This course will cover how to access the Money in Excel template and connect it to financial institutions, downloading financial data.

We will work through a practice problem, imagining we are a small business wanting to construct an income statement needed for our income tax preparation at year end, income tax reported on a Schedule C Profit or Loss From Business Form. As we work the practice problem, we will compare the process to what may be done using traditional accounting software like QuickBooks.

We will then investigate construction of a personal balance sheet using Money in Excel, comparing how the process may be done using traditional accounting software.

The course will also cover other functions provided by Money in Excel including budgeting options and recurring transactions.

results.title: Innovation & Startups: AB Testing Of KPI With Lean Startup
results.author: Alex Genadinik
results.headline: Find growth KPIs for your startup or innovation and grow your startup's innovation using the Lean Startup methodology
results.description:
1) Learn to start an innovative startup.

2) Learn to identify the right factors that will catalyze growth.

3) Use Google Analytics to monitor the correct metrics and KPI.

4) Use that data and insight to focus on and fix the right things.

5) Grow and succeed with your innovation or startup.

HOW TO GROW A STARTUP

Startup and innovative businesses must focus on growth. Most entrepreneurs focus on money too quickly. But startups must focus on growth, which is why identifying the most important growth and engagement metrics is the most important part of starting an innovative new company. 

When you are working on a true innovation, many aspects of your product business are unknown. That's why it's an innovation. If it was a common business that has been done many times before, your KPIs would be known. But since your startup is building something new, you have to identify the right things to focus on in order to grow the most vital parts of your startup.

HOW THIS COURSE WILL HELP YOU PERFECT YOUR INNOVATION OR TECHNOLOGY

Any technology from something simple like a hammer to something complicated like spaceships or computers undergo a series of improvements over time until they get to a desired level of use and quality. No innovation is ideal on its first version so the goal of startup entrepreneurs is to create enough iterations of improvement quickly in order to perfect their product.

The strategy of this course is to show you how to choose the right things to improve so every one of your improvement iterations makes an impact and helps you grow your startup. The way to choose which features of your startup or innovation to improve is to look at use data, analytics, and identify the right KPIs in order to improve the aspects of your startup that are most vital.

The flip side of this is that if you choose the wrong features to improve, it won't make an impact and your innovation or startup won't grow. This course will help you succeed by using time-proven, best strategies to help you grow your startup and improve your product or innovation.

UPDATED FOR 2022

Everything in the course is up-to-date for this year.

ALL TOOLS SHOWN IN THE COURSE ARE FREE

All the tools in the course like Google Analytics are free and standard tools used by startups. You won't have to pay for any additional tools or software after you enroll.

RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT

If you have questions about any part of your startup, I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because:

1) I care about my students.

2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.

BONUSES INCLUDED

* Lots of extra freebies, downloadable worksheets, and exercises to make the course more interactive and helpful to your startup

* Personal invitation to my Facebook community after you complete the course

* My list of 50 business-success skills when you complete the course

Invest in yourself and your innovation! Enroll today!

results.title: Dimagrisci con l'ipnosi, mangiando ciò che vuoi
results.author: Marina Nebbia
results.headline: Dì addio alle diete e ritrova il tuo equilibrio naturalmente (audio corso)
results.description:
***Attenzione: questo corso non è compatibile con le diete. Se sei sotto cure mediche o devi seguire una dieta speciale per ragioni di salute, chiedi un parere al tuo medico prima di comprarlo.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Ho perso peso stabilmente e stabilito col cibo una relazione rilassata. Penso onestamente che le diete non funzionino, questo metodo invece funziona. Mara R.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Fantastico! Nelle prime due settimane ho già perso cinque chili! E non me ne sono neanche accorta. Grazie grazie!!  Rosella F.

E se invece di sacrificarsi restringendo le porzioni si potesse ritrovare il proprio equilibrio naturalmente?
Se potessi mangiare di tutto, davvero tutto quello che desideri, senza dover rinunciare a nulla?
Dimagrire e tornare in forma, energici e felici in modo più semplice, si può!
E il vantaggio è che non ricomincerai a ingrassare probabilmente mai più.

Con questo programma ipnotico, tutto quello che dovrai fare è rilassarti mezz'ora al giorno ascoltando con le tue cuffie le tracce ipnotiche. Grazie alle suggestioni, piano piano il tuo rapporto col cibo diventerà più sano e più equilibrato. Avrai più voglia di muoverti e più energia fisica.

Non dovrai più lottare con il tuo appetito, che diventerà invece un tuo alleato e ti aiuterà attivamente a tornare in forma in maniera sana e allegra.

Sarai sorpreso e stupito di quanto saranno efficaci questi suggerimenti e di quanto diventeranno parte della tua vita quotidiana, dandoti uno schema nuovo di zecca, pensieri nuovi di zecca, un metodo di azione nuovo di zecca, per renderti una persona efficace e di successo.

L'ipnosi è una modalità semplice e positiva. Ascoltando questo programma ipnotico, presto ti accorgerai di averlo comprato per tornare in forma, ma che in realtà ami ascoltarlo tutti i giorni perché semplicemente ti rende felice, rilassato e contento.

results.title: ISTQB Foundation Level Practice Test (CTFL) 2022
results.author: Abdullah Saud
results.headline: The best way to be a software certified tester by having timed practice exams organized by chapter wise.
results.description:
Being ISTQB Foundation Level ( CTFL) Certified could increase your chance to get a software teste position, could help you to get promotion, and will emphasis you to go to next levels of ISTQB Certification.

Now you are asking yourself, How to prepare and pass the ISTQB Foundation level exam? And, How long will it take? Let's quickly find the answers to these.

I will answer the questions briefly and based on my experience.

For preparing to the exam, I have studied the syllabus (one chapter), then I have practiced on questions similar to the exam questions, after I answer the questions correctly, I moved to the next chapter and so on.

For the time the preparing will take In my opinion it depends on the person's knowledge and experience, some people spent weeks to get well prepared others spent one month -2 months.


After you have studied the ISTQB syllabus, you need to practice on questions with similar simulation to the real exam. This practice test will help you to get well prepared for the exam and will help you to pass the exam. it include questions and answers with explaining for some answers. the exam is timed the practice test is ordered by Chapter wise. There are +200 questions with answers.

I recommend you to study the syllabus (one Chapter) well and the take the practice test for this chapter.

To be well prepared, I recommend you to get +90% for this practice exam for each chapter.

you will be scored for each chapter and then you can review your answer.

You can pause the exam and resume it at next time. you retake the exam as many times as you want.

This Practice Exam is designed to assess your knowledge and should not be taken as an indication for the result of the real exam!.

I usually ask my students to test their knowledge by taking the multiple times exams, till they get +90%.

I have helped a lot of people get ISTQB foundation level certification.

International Software Testing Qualifications Board (ISTQB) Certified Tester is suitable for anyone who needs to demonstrate practical knowledge of the fundamental concepts of software testing.

results.title: A'dan Z'ye Blogger İle Web Sitesi Tasarımı Eğitimi | GÜNCEL
results.author: Game Mega Akademi
results.headline: Blogger Üzerinden Ücretsiz Site Kurarak Gelir Elde Etmeyi Öğrenin! | Blogger Eğitim Seti | Blogger Eğitimi | Siteni Kur
results.description:
A'dan Z'ye Blogger İle Web Sitesi Tasarımı Eğtimi, Google'ın kendi platformu olan Blogger baz alınarak hazırlanmış bir kurstur. Google'ın gelişen ve sürekli değişen web dünyasının lideri olduğu düşünülürse, sadece bu bile Blogger paltformunu tercih etmek için mantıklı bir nedendir.

Blogger'da başarılı olabilmenin en temel kuralı kaliteli içerikler oluşturmaktır. Kesinlikle kopya içerik kullanmamalısınız. Eğer içerikleriniz özgün olmaz ise başarı elde edemezsiniz. Sahip olduğunuz yetenekler doğrultusunda ilgi odağınızı yansıtan alanı tercih ederek yazmaya başlamalısınız. Her insanın elbet bir ilgi alanı vardır. Bunu unutmayınız.

Blogger platformu her ne kadar basit gibi görünse de, aslında oldukça esnek ve kullanışlı bir platformdur. Özellikle blog yazmaya yeni başlayanlar veya blog kurmak isteyenler için mükemmel bir ortamdır. İşinizi hızlı bir biçimde görebileceğiniz Blogger platformuyla, biraz çaba sarf ederek, para kazanmak oldukça kolaydır. Sadece düzenli içerik üretimi ve özgün olmak yeterlidir.

Ayrıca, öğrenmesi ve kullanımı çok kolaydır. E peki madem bu kadar kolay, bu eğitime ne gerek var?

Bu eğitimin 3 amacı vardır:

  • Kursumuzda öncelikli amacımız bir uğraş sahibi olabilmektir. Blog yazarlığı da sizler için en güzel uğraş kapısı olacaktır. Aklınızdakileri tüm dünyaya duyurmak istiyorsanız, yeni çevreler edinmek istiyorsanız, internetten para kazanmak istiyorsanız, kursu mutlaka dikkatli izlemelisiniz.

  • Blogger platformunu öğrenmekle geçireceğiniz zaman kaybını önlemek,

  • Blog yazarak para kazanmak isteyen, ama nereden başlayacağını bilmeyenlere rehberlik etmek.

Ayrıca şunu da hatırlatmak isterim, internet üzerinden çalışma oranının sürekli arttığı günümüzde neden siz de internetten para kazanmayasınız? Denemeden bilemezseniz. "Unutmayın denemek başarmanın yarısıdır."

Özellikle evinizin rahat ortamından çalışarak para kazanmak istiyorsanız en garanti yol blog yazmaktır. Çünkü bir blog açmak, tercihe göre paralı ya da parasız, çok kolaydır. Buradaki tek önemli nokta ise süreklilik ve özgünlüktür.

Peki, kendi kendime blogger olmayı öğrenemez miyim?

Tabi ki öğrenebilirsiniz. Ancak tecrübe aktarımı denilen durumdan mahrum kalırsınız. Bu alanda yıllardır çalışan bloggerların ya da içerik üreticilerinden yararlanarak zamandan muazzam oranda tasarruf edebilir ve çok daha hızlı para kazanma seviyesine ulaşabilirsiniz.

İşte bu yüzden böyle bir eğitim var. Benim geçtiğim dolambaçlı ve engebeli yollardan siz de geçerek zaman ve heves kaybetmeyin diye...

Bu Kurs Sonunda Ne Öğreneceksiniz?

Kurs sonunda kendi internet sitenizin sahibi olacaksınız. Blog sitenizi etkin bir şekilde kullanmayı ve makaleler yazmayı öğreneceksiniz. Yeni insanlar tanımayı ve faydalı bilgiler aktarmayı öğreneceksiniz. Unutmayınız ki para kazanma mevzusu her zaman ikinci planda olmalıdır. Eğer işinizde başarı elde ederseniz para kazanmanız kaçınılmaz olacaktır.

Kursumuzda ele alacağımız konular şunlardır:

  1. Blogger kurulumu

  2. Blogger yönetim panelini etkin bir şekilde kullanmayı

  3. Özel Blogger tasarımlarını blogunuza kurmayı

  4. Basit düzey SEO ayarları yapmayı

  5. Alan adı seçimi

  6. Blogger'a özel alan adı bağlama

  7. Blogger'da alt alan adı oluşturma

  8. Anahtar kelime analizleri

  9. Google Search Console kullanımını

  10. Görsel kullanımı

  11. Çeşit Çeşit Siteler Kurma

Kısaca bir blog sitesinde olması gereken tüm her şeyler ve fazlası bu eğitimde anlatılacaktır.

results.title: QuickBooks Pro Desktop -Bookkeeping Business-Easy Way
results.author: Robert (Bob) Steele
results.headline: QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 bookkeeping business plan and examples, walking through bookkeeping engagement & data entry
results.description:
QuickBooks pro desktop 2019 bookkeeping business designed for small business clients or small businesses who want a simple cash basis format for entering data. 

This course is designed for bookkeepers and is also useful for small business owners who want a simple system for entering financial data into QuickBooks for financial planning and year-end tax preparation.

The bookkeeping system we discuss will also describe the relationship between the bookkeeper, the business, and the year-end tax and financial statement preparers.

We will outline a cash basis bookkeeping system using QuickBooks, a system that will enter most transactions directly into the check register.

The course will discuss the responsibilities of a bookkeeper and the responsibilities of the business when a bookkeeping engagement in entered into. 

We will work through a sample bookkeeping project in QuickBooks including the setting up of a new QuickBooks company file.

The course will practice entering data into the QuickBooks register directly from a bank statement. We will provide practice bank statements to use with the project as well as step by step instructional videos.

As we enter data directly into the check register from the bank statement, we will compare and contrast the cash basis system we are using to a full accounting cycle system. We will also review the financial statements periodically to see how QuickBooks is using the data to make reports.

After entering data into the QuickBooks check register from the bank statement, we will perform bank reconciliations. As we perform bank reconciliations, we will discuss what a bank reconciliation is and the benefits a bank reconciliation provides.

The course will then discuss options for entering specific accounting data into QuickBooks including payroll, equipment, loan payments, insurance, credit card payments, and invoices. We will provide practice QuickBooks files for different options related to the items listed above and explore the pros and cons of each option. The bookkeeping options will help tailor our system to our specific bookkeeping needs.

As we enter accounting data into the system we will discuss common questions we will have when entering the first few months of data and how to write down these questions, move forward with data input, and organize the financial data so that we can quickly go back to it once our client questions are answered.

This course will discuss, print, and export month end and year end reports, reports a bookkeeper may provide to clients monthly and reports the business will need at year-end for tax preparation.

We will discuss year-end adjusting entries. The bookkeeping system we propose will depend on an outside accounting firm, tax preparer, or CPA firm to help with the year-end adjusting entries. As bookkeepers we want to be aware of the adjusting entry process so we can work with any year-end accounting firm, tax preparer, or CPA firm. We will enter common adjusting entries into an adjusting entry Excel worksheet and into Quickbooks.

The course will then compare and contrast our different bookkeeping methods and show how those different bookkeeping decisions reconcile to the same numbers after the adjusting entry process.

Finally, we will discuss whether or not to enter the year-end adjusting entries into our QuickBooks bookkeeping system and different options to do so.

In addition to the instructional videos, this course will include downloadable  

•    QuickBooks Backup files

•    Excel practice files

•    Downloadable PDF Files  

The QuickBooks backup files are a great tool that allows us to jump ahead in the material or to rework material if we choose.

Excel practice files will be preformatted and will generally have at least two tabs, one tab with the completed work and a second tab with a preformatted worksheet we can fill in as we watch the instructional videos.   

Who will we be learning from?  

You will be learning from somebody who has technical experience in accounting concepts and in accounting software like QuickBooks, as well as experience teaching and putting together curriculum.  

You will be learning from somebody who is a:  

•    CPA – Certified Public Accountant  

•    CGMA – Chartered Global Management Accountant  

•    Master of Science in Taxation  

•    CPS – Certifies Post-Secondary Instructor  

•    Curriculum Development Export  

As a practicing CPA the instructor has worked with many technical accounting issues and helped work through them and discuss them with clients of all levels.  

As a CPA and professor, the instructor has taught many accounting classes and worked with many students in the fields of accounting, business, and business applications.  

The instructor also has a lot of experience designing courses and learning how students learn best and how to help students achieve their objectives. Experience designing technical courses has also benefit in being able to design a course in a logical fashion and deal with problems related to technical topics and the use of software like QuickBooks Desktop.

Are you looking to extend your knowledge in Javascript programming by learning the concepts of modern javascript - ES6?
If you want to start your journey to become a React or Angular developer, then this is the perfect course for you.

What's this course about?
This course is specifically designed for those who want to get a quick start with Modern Javascript, especially ES6 concepts. It covers all the basic concepts of ES6: how the javascript has evolved, how to use its latest features that come under ES6 topics, what is babel, and how it is used to compile the ES6 code to make it browser compatible. You will get all the behind the scenes of how the ES6 works in the introduction part of the course.

More details, please!
ES6/ES7 modern javascript programming is becoming an essential part of the web development industry, as most companies are shifting towards using various popular web frameworks like Angular JS, Vue JS, or React JS. The demand for Developers with knowledge of ES6 is also on the rise. This course will help you get all the essential knowledge from the get-go and you will be a master in the concepts of ES6 by the end of this course.

In this course, we have covered :

results.title: أحترف برنامج الأكسل من البداية حتي الاحتراف MS Excel 2022
results.author: SMARTER ACADEMY
results.headline: برنامج الاكسل الاحترافي بالتفصيل و التطبيق العملي لأول مرة    حصري
results.description:
أحترف برنامج الأكسل من البداية حتي الاحتراف MS Excel 2022


1- إنشاء الرسوم البيانية

يلعب إكسل دورًا مهمًا للغاية في الرسوم البيانية حيث إنه لديه القدرة على إنتاج مجموعة متنوعة من الرسوم البيانية المختلفة ، والتي قد تستخدمها الإدارات في مختلف المؤسسات لتمثيل البيانات الإحصائية بطريقة تصويرية. نظرًا لإمكانية إجراء الحسابات بالصيغ والدول فمن السهل دائمًا توفير الوقت لإنشاء مخططات. يعتبر Excel أكثر فعالية من حيث التكلفة على عكس برامج الرسوم البيانية الأخرى.

2- تنظيم البيانات

البيانات هي معلومات أولية وغير معالجة وتحتاج إلى تخزينها بطريقة منظمة، لتحقيق ذلك بفعالية نحتاج إلى استخدام Microsoft Excel. يمنح Excel المستخدمين القدرة على إعداد الجداول، حيث يمكنهم تنظيم بياناتهم مع إمكانية تحديثها أيضًا. إن فوائد تنظيم البيانات باستخدام excel يشعر بها الإداريون الذين لديهم دائمًا الكثير من البيانات التي تحتاج إلى تحديثها بانتظام، كذلك تساعد جداول Excel المسؤولين على مراقبة تقدم الإحصائيات الفردية والمجتمعة مثل اتجاهات التقرير وتعقيدات المنتج والتسعير.

3- البرمجة

عندما يتعلق الأمر بالبرمجة ، تكتشف أن MS Excel يدعم تقريبًا جميع تطبيقات لغة البرمجة المستخدمة في إنشاء وحدات الماكرو. هذا يجعل من السهل حل المهام المعقدة وبالتالي زيادة الكفاءة في البرمجة.

وأخيرًا تعد معرفة Microsoft Excel أمرًا حيويًا في معظم المؤسسات الحديثة لكفاءته الفائقة حيث ترغب العديد من المنظمات في الاحتفاظ بسجلاتٍ منتظمة ومحدثة لمنتجاتها وبرامجها وأنشطتها، وبالتالي، يعتبر الأفراد البارعون في إنشاء وحدات ماكرو Excel بمثابة أصول للشركة.

4- جدولة المهام

يعد إسناد مهام العمل لأعضاء الفريق أحد أهم وظائف المديرين. يجبأن ينفذ المديرين هذه المهمة بفعالية حتى يتم الوفاء بالمواعيد النهائية المحددة للمشروع وتسليم المشروع بنجاح إلى العميل. لهذا يستفيد المديرون من ميزة الجدولة المتوفرة في برنامج جداول بيانات MS Excel. يمكن ترميز هذه الجداول باللون كما أنها مصممة بطريقة يتم تحديثها تلقائياً في حال حدوث تغيير في جدول المهام والأنشطة.

5- تنظيم بيانات العملاء

تستخدم مؤسسات الأعمال الصغيرة جداول بيانات MS Excel لتخزين معلومات الاتصال الخاصة بعملائها، تعمل هذه البيانات تعد كقاعدة بيانات للعملاء ويمكن للمؤسسة الاستفادة من هذه المعلومات للاتصال بعملائها. تتمثل ميزة تخزين هذه المعلومات في ورقة MS Excel في أنه على الرغم من تحديث أوراق العمل أو إضافة حقول جديدة إلى الورقة إلا أنها لا تؤثر أو تغير المحتوى الموجود في خلايا جدول البيانات الأخرى.

6- المحاسبة المالية الأساسية

تستخدم المؤسسات الصغيرة والمتوسطة الحجم برنامج جداول البيانات MS Excel لتنفيذ أنشطتها المحاسبية. يمكنهم إنشاء برنامج محاسبة أساسي أو دفتر حسابات يتيح لهم تتبع المعاملات المالية للمؤسسة. لجعله أكثر فعالية ، يمكن للمحاسبين إدخال ودائعهم ونفقاتهم في كل صف بهذه الطريقة ويتيج لهم البرنامج مرونة لإنشاء المخططات والرسوم البيانية بمرور الوقت لمقارنة إيرادات ونفقات الأعمال.

7- تتبع مبيعات المنتجات

يسمح برنامج جداول البيانات MS Excel لأصحاب الأعمال الصغيرة بمتابعة مبيعات منتجاتهم بالكامل وتصميم الخطط التي تعزز مبيعاتهم في السوق بفعالية. من خلال الحفاظ على المسار الكامل للمنتج يحصل أصحاب الأعمال على فكرة واضحة عن التقدم الذي أحرزته الأعمال التجارية خلال الفترة الزمنية المحددة وتساعدهم أيضًا على تحديد اتجاهات المبيعات العالية والمنخفضة للتنبؤ بالقيم المستقبلية.

8-تقارير الأداء

مراقبة الأداء وإعداد التقارير هو نوع متخصص من تحليل الأعمال يمكن إجراؤه بفعالية باستخدام MS Excel. تتمثل إحدى الطرق الشائعة لتحويل البيانات إلى تقرير أداء في Excel في إنشاء جدول محوري، عن طريق إدراج جدول محوري وربطه بالبيانات يمكنك الحصول على معلومات إضافية مفيدة من مجموعة البيانات بسرعة.

results.title: 2022 Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Practice Tests
results.author: SMARTER ACADEMY
results.headline: Cognitively Impaired Residents Communication And Interpersonal Skills Resident’s Rights Legal & Ethical Behaviors
results.description:
Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Practice Tests

97% Pass in First Attempt Easily


  1. Cognitively Impaired Residents

  2. Communication And Interpersonal Skills

  3. Resident’s Rights

  4. Legal & Ethical Behaviors

This CNA practice test contains 40 of the most essential Certified Nursing Assistant questions that will help you prepare for your exam. The test has just been updated for February 2021. This is the first test in a series that covers the knowledge and skills of basic nursing you’ll need as a new certified nursing assistant (CNA). The questions are based on the same categories that are included in the official exam. The test covers the following topics: patient safety and emergency situations, positioning the patient, use of restraints, learning the metric system, and preventing your own injuries. Each multiple-choice question has four answer options. Read the question and select the best answer. Not sure which one is right? Click on the hint. If you still make a mistake, you’ll see the correct response displayed along with an explanation to help you understand. If you miss more than eight questions, you can restart the test and try again.

What to expect on the CNA exam

Your CNA exam will have two parts: the written exam (you’ll have 90 minutes to complete 60 multiple choice questions) and the clinical skills test. The written part will test your knowledge of nursing concepts, while the clinical skills test requires you to perform several essential nursing tasks in front of an evaluator. The skills test portion is about 35-45 minutes and covers five or more skills.

Alternate names:

A CNA test is also known as:

  • Certified Nursing Assistant examination

  • Nursing assistant test

  • CNA knowledge test

  • CNA exam

  • Nurse assistant test

Why CNAs are important

Certified Nursing Assistants are vital members of the health care team. Your skills can keep your patients safe and comfortable. Your ability to provide hands-on care means that you may be the first to notice changes in your patients. You have a lot to learn, but we are here to help. Start with the basic skills. Nearly everything builds from there. As you learn, you will become a valuable team member. Remember that health care would not be possible without the CNA.


CNA – A Certified Nursing Assistant is a nurse that helps patients with healthcare needs under the supervision of a Registered Nurse (RN) or a Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN). Also known as a Nursing Assistant (NA) a Patient Care Assistant (PCA) or a State Tested Nurse Aid (STNA), the individual who carries this title needs a strong work ethic and ability, but issues of liability and legality prevent CNA’s from performing certain procedures.

We have the Best Free CNA Practice Test Online.
These are full-length practice exams with challenging questions. Questions are scored instantly and detailed explanations are provided for each answer.

results.title: Become A Certified Python Programmer: Python Practice Tests
results.author: Pawan Saini
results.headline: Complete the Python Certification Test today!
results.description:
What is Python?

Python is an interpreted, object-oriented, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics. ... Python's simple, easy to learn syntax emphasizes readability and therefore reduces the cost of program maintenance. Python supports modules and packages, which encourages program modularity and code reuse. It was created by Guido van Rossum, and released in 1991.


Why Python?

  • Python works on different platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, Raspberry Pi, etc).

  • Python has a simple syntax similar to the English language.

  • Python has a syntax that allows developers to write programs with fewer lines than some other programming languages.

  • Python runs on an interpreter system, meaning that code can be executed as soon as it is written. This means that prototyping can be very quick.


What does this course offer you?

  • This course consists of 1 practice test.

  • The practice test consists of 40 questions, timed at 60 minutes

  • The questions are multiple-choice.

  • Every question is associated with a knowledge area

  • The answers are randomized every time you take a test

  • Once the test was taken, you will get an instant result report with categories of strength to weakness.

  • You can re-take the tests over and over again as and when it suits you.

Who this course is for:

  • Programmers wishing to get certified in Python

  • Beginner and Intermediate level Python Programmers

  • Young Adults and Kids

  • Python programmers who want to test their python knowledge.

results.headline: Temel İngilizce, Rusça, Fransızca , Arapça, İspanyolca ve Japonca Dersleri
results.description:
Bu kurs, temel bilgiler açısından İngilizce, Rusça, Fransızca , Arapça, İspanyolca ve Japonca dillerine ait en alt seviyeden başlayan dersleri içermektedir. Bu dersler, size bu yeni diller hakkında bilgi ve fikir verecek olup, diğer başlangıçlar ya da kararlar ile bu dilleri öğrenme tam olarak başlamanızı teşvik etmek için size yardımcı olacaktır. İlk olarak başlayacağınız İngilizce dersler, yabancı dil öğrenme teknikleri ile ilgili bilgilerle de desteklenmiştir. Bu kurs, size temel seviyeden, İngilizce, Rusça, Fransızca , Arapça, İspanyolca ve Japonca derslerini sevdirecek ve size fikir olmasından öte, hızlı bir şekilde ilgili dil yazışma ve konuşmaları hakkında bilgi ve fikir verecektir.

Bu kurs, kararınızı etkileyerek, hangi kurs ya da dil ile ilgili olarak kendinizi yetiştireceğiniz bilgisini de kafanızda netleştirecektir. Bu kurstaki dersler, İngilizce, Rusça, Fransızca , Arapça, İspanyolca ve Japonca bilgilerinizi ilerletmek ve değerlendirmek hususunda sizin hangi alanlarda ve nerelerde bu dillerle neler yapacaklarınızı da kafanızda netleştirecektir.

Bu kurstaki derslerle, anlaşılır ve samimi anlatımı ile öğretmenlerinizden, dilerseniz diğer kurs ve kurlarla derslerinizi ve yabancı dil seviyenizi ilerletecek gereksinim kararı bilgisini ve fikirlerini alacaksınız. Pratikte uygulayabileceğiniz ve nasıl başardığınızı teyit edeceğiniz bu kurs, sizi dil biliminde elbette sıfırdan başlangıca ve başlangıçtan, işte o tamamlama kararına götürecektir.

Göreceğiniz dersleri alacağınız bilgiler, elbette size, bir eğitim, bir iş ya da global dünyadaki fırsatlardan onlarca sunacaktır. Tercih ettiğiniz alan ve derslere ya da dile bu kurs karar vermenizde çok etkili olacaktır.

results.title: Wave Accounting
results.author: Robert (Bob) Steele
results.headline: Learn to use bank feeds with free accounting software (Wave) from a practicing Certified Public Accountant (CPA)
results.description:
This course will use free accounting software which is an excellent tool to practice with.

This course will jump right into bank feeds and how to use them.

Many accounting software courses will spend a lot of time talking about how a full-service accounting system works. We do recommend spending time learning the full accounting process, and we do have courses that do just that.

However, many small businesses want to get right down to data input as fast as possible, and others already have a good understanding of the system and want to focus specifically on bank feeds.

We will focus on bank feeds in this course.

For example, some small businesses may be perfectly happy using a cash basis system and will, therefore, not need some of the functions used in a full accounting cycle. Businesses that use a cash basis model can structure their data input to be much more heavily dependent on the bank and bank feed data.

We will discuss types of businesses that fit well into a cash basis model as we work through the practice problems. We will also discuss some problem areas many businesses have and how to set up a system that works for them.

This course will work through a practice problem and will provide test data that learners can use in their system to follow along if they choose.
